title: Add analytics tracking
description: Know what your users are doing.

title: Ensure all links work
description: Use a sitemap tool or broken link finder to discover issues.

title: Test website features on several devices
description: Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, etc.

title: Image sizes are optimized
description: For small websites, services such as tinypng.com can be used.

title: Verify spelling and grammar are correct
Verify all submission forms work correctly
Optimize page performance
description: Google Chrome has a great audit tool

title: Set up website backups
description: Backup project files and databases

title: Register a domain name
Select a website host
description: Dreamhost is a good option (affiliate link).

title: Move website to live servers
description: Develop and test in a local environment before going live!

title: Add a temporary 'Submit Feedback' sticky link
description: Optional, but a great way to get written feedback from users

title: Announce the launch of your website
Enable browser caching
description: Can be done server side, in the browser, and with services (Cloudflare).

title: Scripts are included at the end of a page's markup
description: For browser performance, place JavaScript after the end of a page's markup.

title: Verify website meets local and regional laws
Include copyright, privacy policy, terms of service language
Remove all filler content
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

title: Fully integrate and test payment processor services
description: If possible, run a few test transactions through your processor to verify.

title: Custom 404 pages
description: Custom 404 pages can prevent lost traffic and drive users to the correct page.

title: Validate RSS feeds are publishing
HTML has passed W3 validation tests
description: W3 Validator

title: CSS has passed W3 validation tests
description: CSS Validator

title: Verify JavaScript has no critical errors
JS/CSS files are minified and sequentially merged
description: Modern compilers like Webpack and Browserify will really help with this.

title: All media files, CSS, JS, and links reference live file structures
Contact information is up to date and correct
Logo links back to the homepage
Verify the timezone
description: For dynamic content and user focused websites, a timezone may matter.

title: Viewport meta data does not restrict zoom level
All actionable elements can be triggered via keyboard
Images have descriptive alt text
description: Not only does this help screen reader users, but also in instances where users have slow connections.

title: Don't place text over images
description: Changing resolutions and image colors may cause text contrast issues.

title: Use images instead of CSS declared background-images
description: High contrast settings ignore CSS background images. Use an alternative such as embedded SVGs.

title: Use native elements over custom programmed features
description: That custom dropdown may look cool, but is it actually usable?

title: High contrast exists between text and background
description: Contrast Checker

title: High contrast exists between links and body text
description: Link Contrast Checker

title: Markup and tab order matches visual representation
Navigation is intuitive
Calls-to-action are clear
description: No "click here," "view more," or exposed URL links and buttons.

title: Landmark regions are appropriately used
A :focus state exists for all actionable elements
description: A visual indication should show when an item is focused.

title: Errors and warnings from accessibility tools are handled
description: WebAim Accessibility Checker

title: All fields, links, and actionable elements have descriptive labeling
HTML5 landmark tags are utilized appropriately
description: <nav> for navigation, <header> for header, etc.

title: Heading tag usage is consecutive
description: H1, H2, H3, etc. H1, H3 and no H2 will cause accessibility issues.

title: Page language is indicated
description: The lang attribute is set on the html tag.

title: Get an SSL certificate
description: Modern browsers will start to warn users of non-secure websites in the future.

title: Minimize plugin usage
description: Plugins by 3rd party developers can often pose security risks, in addition to cluttering up a project.

title: Remove any test accounts before launch
description: User: test Pass: test

title: Ensure any monitoring services are notifying the correct individuals
description: If a tree falls on your server, but no one is notified, then did your server really crash?

title: Robots.txt is appropriately setup
Verify form validation also has backend verification
description: Front end validation of forms, search fields, etc. is not enough!

title: Limit upload sizes
Test for XSS vulnerabilities
Sanitize SQL queries
description: XKCD Comic

title: Ensure all packages and plugins are updated
The web console reveals no errors/risks
description: Verify that there are no risky entries the console log.

title: Set up website in Google Webmaster Tools
Submit URL to Google
Check SEO grade
description: Moz.com offers a great tool to test a site's level of optimization.

title: Ensure landmark regions are properly utilized
description: Great for accessibility too!

title: Proper usage of heading tags
description: Heading tags should help categorize and describe the contents of a page.

title: Links have meaningful anchor text
Pages have the appropriate keywords
Images have descriptive alt text
Filter out any internal IPs from analytics tools to better measure results
Submit XML sitemap to Google
URLs are readable
description: /myPage.cgi?xa=abcd1234 vs /abcd1234

title: Schema is utilized where appropriate
Meta data is added and appropriate to each page
Robots.txt is appropriately setup
Old content is 301 redirected to new content
description: The biggest mistake of established websites is to forget their current users.

title: Canonical tag is added to relevant pages
Add favicon
Add iOS home screen icon
Add theming color for Android
Displays and functions as expected in all desired browsers
description: This is the 'browser compatibility testing' to-do. CrossBrowserTesting.com is a great service for this.

title: Purchase rights to or replace any copyrighted media
Use modals wisely
description: Not every piece of content should be stored in a modal, as this introduces accessibility and technical complexities.

title: Navigation is intuitive
Calls-to-action are clear
Print styles exist and are tested
Ensure custom fonts load on all desired platforms
Established style guide and patterns are utilized
description: If your project is relying on a design system, work to ensure that all UX overrides are appropriately implemented.

title: Website meets WCAG 2.0 requirements at a minimum
Forms submit to the right person/location
Non-public content is tested to be innaccessible and unfindable by search engines
Default passwords are updated
description: Occasionally, CMS's will come with default credentials.

title: Page titles contain target keyword(s)
